item.description:
I have no idea what I just said, but aren't we all a little Irish on St. Patty's Day?  I grew up in St. Patrick's School, and ALL us French girls were Irish on the 17th.  Maybe we can get some green beer and green jello shots...lol. Ok, TMI

not to mention...I just love this band!  and after a Friday night at the "hoe down" I'm gonna have to get the low down, and fire it up with WILDFIRE baby! 

Wildfire plays a great variety of tunes, mostly rock 'n roll from my era...of course I'm only 49 (again).  They start about 9-9:30. there is a $5 cover...don't recall what time.

I'll be there for dinner at 7-7:30, so if you get there before me,  I'll have a reservation for us, under "susan/meetup". 

 In your reply tell me if you're coming for dinner.  I've made a tentative reservation for 10, and will doublecheck in a day or two.  I would just ask that the people who make a dinner reservation take the reserved table, and I will try and get booths nearby for those not eating, or coming later to dance, (and who probably won't need a seat anyway), and someone can have my seat after dinner, as I'll be up on the dance floor with them!

BTW, NO need to reply "no" I have enough emails to deal with, ty ;)

Hope to "meetup" with YOU soon!

Top of the day to you,

Susan?
item.how_to_find_us: Shamrocks if I can find them, on the table, otherwise meetup signs ;)
item.name: ERIN GO BRAH to "Wildfire" at TPs
